Cruise Information

Stuff you need to know.

Henry and Caroline’s wedding will take place aboard the Ruby Princess. Please see General Information and Reservation Instructions below. If this is your first time cruising, please be sure to read everything.

The Bride and Groom kindly request that all guests make their room reservation and RSVP before November 2017, as the total number of guests are needed to complete the planning. In addition, due to budget restrictions, the Bride and Groom can only accommodate the individuals listed in the Save the Date and formal Wedding Invitation. Thank you so much for your understanding.

For more details, please go to the Princess Cruise website or call our Cruise Vacation Planner, Jordan Walker.

Reservation Instructions

To make a reservation, please call our Vacation Cruise Planner, Jordan Walker, with the details listed below. Please make your room reservation and RSVP before October 2017.

01

Group Reservation Info
  • Group Name: The Chea Wedding
  • Group Number: TPX
  • Voyage Code: R718
  • Ship: Ruby Princess
  • Departure Date: March 22, 2018
  • Destination: West Coast Cruise

02

Room Type

Depending on what type of room you select, the Cruise Vacation Planner will assist in selecting your room so that you are close to the rest of the wedding guests.

The options are Interior, Ocean View, Balcony, Mini-Suite, and Suite.

See pricing & room details >>

03

Your Information

Prepare the following information before calling the Cruise Vacation Planner:

  • a. All passengers names staying in your room as they appear on their passports
  • b. Birth dates for all passengers
  • c. [optional] Captain’s Circle Member number if you have cruised with Princess Cruises before
  • d. Phone numbers, mailing addresses, and email addresses
  • e. Preferred bed configuration (queen versus twin).
  • Note: This will depend on the type of room you are choosing and how many people are in your room. The Cruise Vacation Planner can help you through this.
  • f. Dining selection. We kindly request that you select the 6:00PM traditional dining so that all of our wedding guests are together for dinner.
  • g. Any special requirements you may have, including food allergies, dietary restrictions, medical needs, etc.

04

Call Our Vacation Cruise Planner:
  • Jordan Walker
  • (800) 901-1172 ext. 41839
  • Monday-Friday, 8:30AM to 5:15PM PST

Aside from taking your reservation, the Vacation Cruise Planner can also help you with other questions regarding the cruise (ie. excursions, spa reservations, etc.)

Useful Information

People that use our Group Reservation will receive onboard credit. The more people we get under our Group, the more onboard credit everyone will receive. We will not know how much onboard credit everyone will receive until two weeks before the cruise departs, but at minimum, everyone will receive $25/person.
If at any time the cruise goes on sale, anyone who has reserved under our Group will receive the adjusted price. If you have already put a deposit down, your total to be paid will be lowered. If you have already paid the full amount, you will receive a refund.

R.S.V.P.

To make a reservation, please call our Vacation Cruise Planner, Julie Hurley, with the details listed below. Please make your room reservation and RSVP before October 2017.

RSVP Now
